name: prosy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
similar to or relating to prose (= written language in its ordinary form rather than poetry): For a poet, the writing is surprisingly prosy.
disapproving boring or not showing any imagination: The surgeon began to speak in a prosy medical way. Sometimes the president can become rather prosy.
More examplesFewer examplesI found the poems prosy and difficult to read.The work is lengthy and extremely prosy.As a writer he has a weakness for prosy exposition.Her calculated, spare prose is never prosy.
